thread.title: Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames
thread.title_full: Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames

title: Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames
text:
Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Washington Capitals' Alex Ovechkin, right, from Russia, checks Calgary Flames' Sam Bennett during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Washington Capitals' T. J. Oshie, left, chases the puck as Calgary Flames' Mark Giordano, right, defends and goalie Karri Ramo, from Finland, looks on during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Calgary Flames goalie Karri Ramo, from Finland, makes a save against the Washington Capitals during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Calgary Flames goalie Karri Ramo, from Finland, makes a save against the Washington Capitals during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Washington Capitals' Alex Ovechkin, center, from Russia, celebrates his goal with teammates T. J. Oshie, left, and John Carlson during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Washington Capitals' Alex Ovechkin, right, from Russia, looks on as his shot goes over the net and Calgary Flames goalie Karri Ramo, from Finland, during the first period of an NHL hockey game in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Washington Capitals' Brooks Laich, left, looks on as Calgary Flames' goalie Karri Ramo, second from right, from Finland, grabs the puck after losing his helmet during the first period of an NHL hockey game in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Calgary Flames' Sean Monahan, center, celebrates his goal with teammates during the first period of an NHL hockey game against the Washington Capitals in Calgary, Alberta, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015.(Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Washington Capitals' Chandler Stephenson, right, gets away from Calgary Flames' Dougie Hamilton during the third period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday Oct. 20. 2015, in Calgary, Alberta. (Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) Jeff McIntosh Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames 
Washington Capitals' Brooks Orpik, right, checks Calgary Flames' Michael Frolik, from the Czech Republic, during the third period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday Oct. 20. 2015, in Calgary, Alberta. (Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press via AP) Posted: Tuesday, October 20, 2015 9:16 pm | Updated: 11:00 pm, Tue Oct 20, 2015. Backstrom, Ovechkin lead Capitals over Flames Associated Press | 
CALGARY, Alberta (AP) â€” Nicklas Backstrom scored twice and Alex Ovechkin added a goal and an assist as the Washington Capitals beat the Calgary Flames 6-2 on Tuesday night. 
Andre Burakovsky, T.J. Oshie and Jason Chimera also scored for Washington, and Evgeny Kuznetsov added three assists. The Capitals, playing their first road game of the season, have opened with four wins in five games. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You
